In England, in the seven days to 26 April, there were 13,414 new confirmed cases (23.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 19 April, there were 13,873 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 3% (459 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 01 May is 3,860,524 (6,858.6 cases per 100,000 population).
